scripts.watch: cross-env LIB=true NODE_ENV=development npx tailwindcss -i tailwind.css -o tailwind_theme/tailwind.css --config tailwind.config.js --postcss --watch
scripts.watch-wp: cross-env LIB=true WP=true NODE_ENV=development npx tailwindcss -i tailwind.css -o tailwind_theme/tailwind_for_wp_editor.css --config tailwind.config.js --postcss --watch
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i tailwind.css -o tailwind_theme/tailwind.css --config tailwind.config.js --postcss --minify
